Hi!

I implemented something like this and posted it on github.
Essentially=
, the modified Suite matches a regexp against all classes in the class path=
 and executes those matching (this is there is one to exclude others, too).=
 However, this only works for entire classes and not for individual tests.
=

Cheers,
 Georg
